articles.title: USA Hockey unveils Beijing 2022 Olympic and Paralympic jerseys - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: USA Hockey has unveiled the jersey that the American men’s, women’s and para hockey teams will wear at the 2022 Olympics and Paralympics in Beijing.
articles.content:
USA Hockey has unveiled the jersey that the American mens, womens and para hockey teams will wear at the 2022 Olympics and Paralympics in Beijing.

articles.title: Toyota GR Corolla officially teased with an image full of clues - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: The Toyota GR Corolla has been officially teased by the American unit of the Japanese manufacturer. What looks like a simple interior shot is actually a series of clues that hints to a hot hatch variant of the longstanding moniker.

articles.title: K-pop's BTS snags top prize at American Music Awards - Marianas Variety
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) — K-Pop band BTS was the big winner at the American Music Awards on Sunday just four years after making their first appearance on the fan-voted show.
